comprehensive_overview: Intel Threading Building Blocks (TBB) is a widely-used C++ library for parallelism. It provides a way to write parallel C++ programs that take full advantage of multi-core processors.
core_features:
1. Parallel algorithms and containers for C++.
2. Task scheduler framework for managing parallel workloads.
3. Scalability features for efficient multi-core utilization.
4. Portable and easy-to-use API for developers.
